name: Fireman's Quest
description:
Fireman's Quest is an 8-bit puzzle game with nostalgic sounds and graphics.
Help the fireman to fight the fire and save the neighborhood by using intelligence (he needs help with this), a hammer and his fire extinguisher.

Face 100 challenges until you get to the cause of all this disorder. There is no time to lose!

Game Features:
• Addictive gameplay;
• 10 areas;
• 100 levels/puzzles;
• Time challenges;
• Boss fight;
• Compatible with joystick.
